subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi was doing his job when he charged the field and rushed to Alex Rodriguez’s defense after Boston’s Ryan Dempster drilled him with a fastball at Fenway Park.
snippet: Joe Girardi was doing his job when he charged the field and rushed to Alex Rodriguez’s defense after Boston’s Ryan Dempster drilled him with a fastball at Fenway Park.
